Reference Projects

Sinowatcher is professional traffic light provider
for 10 years. Our products have spread to many
countries and have gained a good reputation in both
domestic and overseas markets due to our great support in ITS projects.

LED Traffic Lights

Our broad range of traffic signals ensures that you find 
solution for all sorts of traffic lighting projects such as 
junctions, highways, toll stations, tunnels or car parking. 
In case you require customized traffic light product 
we will do all our best to provide such item.

Quality Control

We have implemented strict QC procedures at all stages
of our production in order to provide high-quality products
which can fully function even in harsh environments.
We carefully test all incoming raw material to make sure
our items are able to meet our 3 years quality guarantee.
